languages.text: "Вы же не пытаетесь умилостивить члена Инквизиции взяткой? Это был бы не слишком проницательный шаг".
"Surely you're not trying to appease a member of the Inquisition with a bribe? Not the most prudent tactic on your part."
languages.original_text: "Вы же не пытаетесь умилостивить члена Инквизиции взяткой? Это был бы не слишком проницательный шаг".

traits.locale_text: "Surely you're not trying to appease a member of the Inquisition with a bribe? Not the most prudent tactic on your part."
"Surely you're not trying to appease a member of the Inquisition with a bribe? Not the most prudent tactic on your part."
"Surely you're not trying to appease a member of the Inquisition with a bribe? Not the most prudent tactic on your part."

"Surely you're not trying to appease a member of the Inquisition with a bribe? Not the most prudent tactic on your part."

languages.text: 「異端審問庁の者を買収しようとしなかったのは確かか？そこまで優れた戦術ではなかったな」
languages.original_text: "Surely you're not trying to appease a member of the Inquisition with a bribe? Not the most prudent tactic on your part."

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問庁の者を買収しようとしなかったのは確かか？そこまで優れた戦術ではなかったな」

languages.original_text: "Surely you're not trying to appease a member of the Inquisition with a bribe? Not the most prudent tactic on your part."

languages.text: “我猜你这么说，并非是要蓄意行贿审判庭成员吧？我劝你谨言慎行。”
languages.original_text: "Surely you're not trying to appease a member of the Inquisition with a bribe? Not the most prudent tactic on your part."

traits.locale_text: “我猜你这么说，并非是要蓄意行贿审判庭成员吧？我劝你谨言慎行。”

languages.text: «No estará intentando sobornar a un miembro de la Inquisición para apaciguarle, ¿verdad? Sería una táctica tremendamente imprudente».
languages.original_text: "Surely you're not trying to appease a member of the Inquisition with a bribe? Not the most prudent tactic on your part."

traits.locale_text: «No estará intentando sobornar a un miembro de la Inquisición para apaciguarle, ¿verdad? Sería una táctica tremendamente imprudente».

languages.text: « J'espère sincèrement que vous n'essayez pas de soudoyer un membre de l'Inquisition. Ce serait extrêmement malavisé de votre part. »
languages.original_text: "Surely you're not trying to appease a member of the Inquisition with a bribe? Not the most prudent tactic on your part."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère sincèrement que vous n'essayez pas de soudoyer un membre de l'Inquisition. Ce serait extrêmement malavisé de votre part. »

languages.text: "Ihr wollt doch nicht etwa ein Mitglied der Inquisition mit einer Bestechung besänftigen? Das wäre keine sonderlich kluge Taktik Eurerseits."
languages.original_text: "Surely you're not trying to appease a member of the Inquisition with a bribe? Not the most prudent tactic on your part."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt doch nicht etwa ein Mitglied der Inquisition mit einer Bestechung besänftigen? Das wäre keine sonderlich kluge Taktik Eurerseits."

languages.text: "Rüşvetle bir Engizisyon mensubunun gönlünü almaya çalışmıyorsun ya? Pek de sağduyulu bir taktik sayılmaz."
languages.original_text: "Surely you're not trying to appease a member of the Inquisition with a bribe? Not the most prudent tactic on your part."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Engizisyon üyesini rüşvetle bastırmaya çalışmıyorsun şüphesiz? Pek de sağduyulu bir taktik sayılmaz."
